alert.note: Alert for Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 09 at 3:32AM EST until February 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected, becoming west overnight. * WHERE...In Maryland, Allegany County. In West Virginia, Eastern Grant, Mineral and Eastern Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will be confined to the ridges during the evening. Around midnight, winds will shift to the west, and strong gusts will occur at the lower elevations as well.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Western Mineral
